item.title: The script that got me #3 on tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @jahuro jahuro
item.description:
@jahuro wrote:

This is MY script. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,190789.0.html

You took it, and added useless procedures. Even the colour finding is exactly the same.

If (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 3983594, 95, 10, 180, 45, 25))Then

And I also know you’ve been using it, due to this posted on my topic:

Ultimate tug-o-war

Totaly got 7th place.

So you cant say you came up with it all by yourself.

Also, the reason why MY script dosnt work on night mode, is because i left cheating before i finished it. I come back, and this is what i find. Not even 1 bit of credit. I suggest you delete this topic, before everyone see’s you as the worthless n00b you are.

Read full topic

item.title: The script that got me #3 on tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @pyrnight pyrnight
item.description:
@pyrnight wrote:

Well, neopets banned my account, (for “cheating” on whack-a-staff… i forgot to randomize the clicks >_<)

So here is my scar script for Tug-O-War… It works trust me.

Only thing to remember is, it WILL [size=14pt]NOT[/size] DO THE CODES ON THE NIGHT LEVEL
You have to get those codes perfect, so those are up to you (its really not that hard).

[code]program betterultimatetugowar;
var speed : Integer;
var tol : Integer;
var x,y : Integer;
procedure pwnkeys;
begin
If (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 3983594, 95, 10, 180, 45, 25))Then
begin
if not (findColor(x,y,6697728,0,0,4,4)) then
begin
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
Wait(50);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
end;
end;
end;

begin
speed := 50; // Speed
tol := 10; // Random Range
// Ex. speed 50, tol 10, random numbers from 40-60
// Experimenting with this value is the best thing to do

repeat
// ‘Pwnkeys’ runs 3 times a cycle,
// makes getting the magic codes much much much faster

KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘v’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘x’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘n’));
pwnkeys;
Wait(speed+Random(tol));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘v’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘x’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘n’))
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘b’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘c’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
pwnkeys;
Wait(speed+Random(tol));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘b’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘c’));
pwnkeys;
until(False);
end.
[/code]

Read full topic
